select t1.id , t1.dept_id , t1.company_code , t1.company_name , t1.name_en , t1.short_name , t1.short_name_en , t1.address , t1.receive_address , t1.company_type , t1.company_level , t1.country , t1.province , t1.setupdate , t1.business_nature , t1.operating_status , t1.language , t1.telephone , t1.fax , t1.mail , t1.account_name , t1.account_id , t1.account_address , t1.account_tel , t1.account_bank_name , t1.account_no , t1.describe , t1.contacts , t1.service_representative , t1.legal_person , t1.cl_client_code , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.heat_sort , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from csmp_bd_companyinfo t1 left join CSMP_BD_COM_STR t2 on t2.com_id=t1.id
t2.Str_id = #{bean.nodeId}

insert into csmp_bd_companyinfo
id,
node_id,
dept_id,
company_code,
company_name,
name_en,
short_name,
short_name_en,
address,
receive_address,
company_type,
company_level,
country,
province,
setupdate,
business_nature,
operating_status,
language,
telephone,
fax,
mail,
account_name,
account_id,
account_address,
account_tel,
account_bank_name,
account_no,
describe,
contacts,
service_representative,
legal_person,
cl_client_code,
remark,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
heat_sort,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,

where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

t1.account_bank_name =#{accountBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.account_no =#{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.describe =#{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.contacts =#{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.service_representative =#{serviceRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.legal_person =#{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.cl_client_code =#{clClientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{dto.creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{dto.lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.heat_sort =#{heatSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.node_id , t1.dept_id , t1.company_code , t1.company_name , t1.name_en , t1.short_name , t1.short_name_en , t1.address , t1.receive_address , t1.company_type , t1.company_level , t1.country , t1.province , t1.setupdate , t1.business_nature , t1.operating_status , t1.language , t1.telephone , t1.fax , t1.mail , t1.account_name , t1.account_id , t1.account_address , t1.account_tel , t1.account_bank_name , t1.account_no , t1.describe , t1.contacts , t1.service_representative , t1.legal_person , t1.cl_client_code , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.heat_sort , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from csmp_bd_companyinfo t1

select distinct t1.id , t1.company_name from CSMP_BD_COMPANYINFO t1 left join CSMP_BD_COM_STR t2 on t1.id = t2.com_id left join CSMP_BD_COMPANYSTRUCTURE t3 on t3.id = t2.str_id where t3.catalog_type=#{catalogType}

select comp.id , comp.node_id , comp.dept_id , comp.company_code , comp.company_name , comp.name_en , comp.short_name , comp.short_name_en , comp.address , comp.receive_address , comp.company_type , comp.company_level , comp.country , comp.province , comp.setupdate , comp.business_nature , comp.operating_status , comp.language , comp.telephone , comp.fax , comp.mail , comp.account_name , comp.account_id , comp.account_address , comp.account_tel , comp.account_bank_name , comp.account_no , comp.describe , comp.contacts , comp.service_representative , comp.legal_person , comp.cl_client_code , comp.remark , comp.created_by , comp.creation_date , comp.last_updated_by , comp.last_update_date , comp.last_update_ip , comp.heat_sort , comp.version , comp.attribute_01 , comp.attribute_02 , comp.attribute_03 , comp.attribute_04 , comp.attribute_05 , comp.attribute_06 , comp.attribute_07 , comp.attribute_08 , comp.attribute_09 , comp.attribute_10 , info.id as aricarftId, info.batch_no as batchNoName, moel.id as aricarftmodelId, moel.model_name as modelName from csmp_bd_companyinfo comp inner join csmp_bd_aircraftinfo info on comp.id = info.company_id inner join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel moel on info.model_id = moel.id inner join csmp_bd_com_str str on str.com_id = comp.id where 1=1 and str.com_type = #{comType}

select distinct T1.company_code, T1.id, T1.node_id, T1.dept_id, T1.company_name, T1.name_en, T1.short_name, T1.short_name_en, T1.address, T1.receive_address, T1.company_level, T1.country, T1.province, T1.setupdate, T1.business_nature, T1.operating_status, T1.language,T1.heat_sort, T1.telephone, T1.fax, T1.mail, T1.account_name, T1.account_id, T1.account_address, T1.account_tel, T1.account_bank_name, T1.account_no, T1.describe, T2.COM_TYPE AS company_type, T1.contacts, T1.service_representative, T1.legal_person, T1.cl_client_code, T1.remark from csmp_bd_companyinfo T1 INNER JOIN CSMP_BD_COM_STR T2 ON T2.COM_ID = T1.ID WHERE T2.COM_TYPE = 'customer' and t1.contacts = #{id}
select distinct t.company_name,t.name_en,t.short_name,t.address from HDKF.HDKF_BD_COMPANYINFO t,HDKF_ES_NOTICEINFO_EFFECTIVE t1 where t.id = t1.customer_id and t1.bulletin_id = #{id}
